name: The Substitute (Valnati)
description:
You've seen most things at this point in your career - and it's always a juggling act of learning the students quickly without breaking anything for the day. Field trips? They're a little more complicated.

 This one especially.

Created for inkjam 2022.

(Cover image "31944 2011 Blue Bird 77 Maximum Passenger School Bus" by bsabarnowl is licensed under CC BY 2.0.)
